Key Match Events: Cam Whitmore and Alperen Sengun combined to score 20 points during a 23-4 run in the second quarter, turning a 10-point deficit into a 53-44 lead.
The Rockets opened the third quarter with a 9-2 burst, featuring a 3-pointer by Jabari Smith Jr.
Whitmore and Sengun each made key three-pointers during the game, contributing to the Rockets' lead.
Post-Match Reflections: The Rockets won without two key bench contributors: Tari Eason (leg) and Amen Thompson (suspension).
The Mavericks were already without their leading scorer, Luka Doncic (calf), and lost P.J. Washington to a right knee sprain during the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets' victory extended their streak to three consecutive wins.
The Mavericks struggled from the arc, going 0 for 6 in the first half and 6 for 24 in the game.
